content.question: Some opponents of the ideas proposed in the excerpt later argued in the 1830s that individual state governments should

choices.label: request national funds for internal improvements
nullify federal laws with which they disagreed
determine whether slavery would be permitted

content.answer: nullify federal laws with which they disagreed

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
